r.d:
This is a simple HTML form generator. It supports all the HTML form element types including file uploads, may return or print the form, just individual form elements or the full form in "table mode" with a fixed layout.
This package has been superceded by HTML_QuickForm.
r.n: * Add methods for password rows without confirmation fields. Request 3867. * Have docblocks for Select methods indicate defaults must match data type of entries. Bug 3870.
